hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
cd target
cat /usr/local/docker-config/wildfly/standalone.xml | grep client_secret | cut -d '=' -f 3 | sed 's/[\"/\>]//g' > secret.txt
export appplication_uuid=`cat /usr/local/docker-config/httpd/picsureui_settings.json | grep applicationIdForBaseQuery | cut -d ':' -f 2| sed 's/[",]*//g'`
# This UUID is currently a magic number of sorts, this will need to be parameterized to make this job portable export new_token_introspection_token=`java -jar generateJwt.jar secret.txt sub "PSAMA_APPLICATION|${appplication_uuid}" 365 day | grep -v "Generating"`
export old_token_introspection_token=`cat /usr/local/docker-config/wildfly/standalone.xml | grep token_introspection_token | cut -d '=' -f 3 | sed 's/[\"/\>]//'g`
sed -i "s/$old_token_introspection_token/$new_token_introspection_token/g" /usr/local/docker-config/wildfly/standalone.xml
docker run -i -v /root/.my.cnf:/root/.my.cnf --network=host mysql mysql -h 127.0.0.1 -e \ "update application set token='$new_token_introspection_token';" auth
